text: Herbert Mies (23 February 1929 - 14 January 2017) was a German politician. He joined the Communist Party of Germany (KPD) in 1945. He was the chairman of the party from 1973 to 1989. He was a winner of the 1985-86 Lenin Peace Prize. He was born in Mannheim, Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg. Mies died on 14 January 2017 in Mannheim at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:German communist politicians Category:Politicians from Mannheim
title: Herbert Mies
